alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 23 at 11:54AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet affecting Blaine County. .Warm temperatures will melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...East Fork Big Wood River at Gimlet. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.9 feet, Minor flooding from around the Triumph area downriver to the confluence of the Big Wood River. East Fork Road near Triumph may have water flowing over it. Areas around Hyndman View Drive may have water flowing over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 7.8 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.9 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.7 feet on 06/29/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 East Fork Big Wood River Gimlet 7.9 7.8 Tue 11 am MD MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive through flooded areas.
